CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. Low-band-gap polymers
2. Polymers (for BHJ-type PSCs)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. The paragraph is discussing the use of specific types of polymers, namely those with low band gaps, for the production of bulk heterojunction polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Low-band-gap polymers

This is the only material name mentioned in the paragraph that is directly relevant to the context. The other entities mentioned, such as "bulk heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells (PSCs)" and "solar spectrum," are concepts or contextual information that do not refer to specific material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
